test.instr: (:ins (:task (putdown X) (:cond (color X green) (sort X can))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (color X yellow) (sort X bottle) (type Y container) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X microwave) (type X container))) (:cons_notnot (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave)))) )
test.nl: Put down the green can. Put the yellow bottle on microwave. Pick up the red book. Go to microwave. There is must be the microwave is opened.
